item.title: Cooks Assistant Dialogue WTF
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

I have Cooks Assistant running excellently on my RuneSource server. Done by scratch (the quest). The issue is that whenever I reach the dialogue in case 8, it ends dialogue… I have no idea what the heck this is.

case 278 : //Cooks Assistant Quest if (player.getCooksAss() < 99) { switch(player.getDialogue().getChatId()) { case 1 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("What am I to do?", SAD); return true; case 2 : player.getDialogue().sendOption("What's wrong?", "Can you make me a cake?", "You don't look very happy.", "Nice hat!"); return true; case 3 : switch(optionId) { case 1 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear, I'm in a terrible,", "terrible mess! It's the Duke's birthday today,", "and I should be making him a lovely, big", "birthday cake using special ingredients..." , SAD); player.getDialogue().setNextChatId(4); return true; case 2 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("*sniff* Don't talk to me about cakes...", SAD); player.getDialogue().endDialogue(); return true; case 3 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("No, I'm not. The world is caving in around me", " - I am overcome by dark feelings of impending doom.", SAD); player.getDialogue().endDialogue(); return true; case 4 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("Er, thank you. It`s a pretty ordinary cook's hat, really.", CALM); player.getDialogue().endDialogue(); return true; } break; case 4 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("...but I've forgotten to get the ingredients. I'll never", "get them in time now. He'll sack me! What", "ever will I do? I have four children and a goat", "to look after. Would you help me? Please?" , SAD); return true; case 5 : player.getDialogue().sendOption("I'm always happy to help a cook in distress.", "Sorry, I have troubles of my own."); return true; case 6 : switch(optionId) { case 1 : player.getDialogue().sendPlayerChat("I'm always happy to help a cook in distress.", HAPPY); player.getActionSender().doingTheQuest(); return true; case 2 : player.getDialogue().sendPlayerChat("Sorry, I have troubles of my own.", SAD); player.getDialogue().endDialogue(); } break; case 7 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("Oh thank you, thank you. I need milk, an egg and", "flour. I'd be very grateful if you can get them for me.", HAPPY); return true; case 8 : player.getDialogue().sendPlayerChat("So where do I find these ingredients then?", CALM); return true; case 9 : player.getDialogue().sendNpcChat("You can mill some flour at the mill North of the castle,", "You can milk the cows in the field North-East of here,", "and you can kill chickens for eggs.", HAPPY); player.setCooksAss(99); player.getDialogue().endDialogue(); } break;

Read full topic
